socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports non-aura hex curse skills.

Hexes from Supported Skills have no Duration
Enemies on the Cursed Ground from a Supported Skill are Cursed with that Hex

Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed

Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."
